text: Michael P. Reese (March 7, 1978 â€“ January 2, 2021) was an American politician. He was a Republican member of the Pennsylvania House of Representatives from 2009 until his death in 2021. He was born in Mount Pleasant Township, Pennsylvania. Reese died on January 2, 2021 in Greensburg, Pennsylvania from a brain aneurysm at the age of 42. ==References== Category:1978 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Members of the Pennsylvania General Assembly Category:Politicians from Pennsylvania Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Mike Reese (Pennsylvania politician)
